sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import {Carousel} from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {useAppDispatch, useAppSelector} from "../../hooks/redux"; import { fetch_all_wares, fetch_discount_wares, fetch_novelty_wares } from "../../redux/action_creators/ware_action_creator"; const Welcome = () => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch() const {noveltyWares, discountWares} = useAppSelector(state => state.wareReducer) useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetch_discount_wares({countOfRecords: 4})) dispatch(fetch_novelty_wares({countOfRecords: 8})) }, [ ]) return ( <>
Go over

DISCOUNTS

{discountWares.map(item =>

-{100 - Math.floor(100 * item.price / item.oldPrice)}%

{item.name}

{item.sizes}

{item.price} грн.

{item.oldPrice} грн.

)}

NOVELTIES

{noveltyWares.map((item) =>
{item.name}

{item.sizes}

{item.price} грн.

)}
); }; export default Welcome;
